name: Rum and Pineapple Juice
description: This easygoing highball tastes like the tropics. Nutmeg freshly grated over the top adds a hint of spice.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a highball glass with ice and add rum, pineapple juice and soda. Grate a little nutmeg on top and garnish with a chunk of pineapple.

video.name: Rum and Pineapple Juice
video.description: How to make this easygoing drink that tastes like the tropics.
